item.title: NOMAD 3 - Third time lucky?
item.description: I intend to use this blog to announce new features, releases etc but since this is my first post here I will try to explain little bit of the background of this project and outline where I would like to take it in near and even distant future.
item.content:encoded: I intend to use this blog to announce new features, releases etc but since this is my first post here I will try to explain little bit of the background of this project and outline where I would like to take it in near and even distant future.
